title: Kathakali: the dance drama of Kerala
creator_credit: Mohan Wadhwani, Ezra Mir and India Films Division
brief_description: Shows the State of Kerals followed by a detailed look at preparations for the Kathakali, the traditional all-night dance of Kerala which depicts the war between the gods. Concludes with excerpts from the dance.
creator_credit_for_label: Mohan Wadhwani, Ezra Mir and India Films Division
